messages.subject: Re: Other Unschooling Conference (was The 2008 Unschooling Conference - Madison, WI)
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a copy of an email Barb sent me a couple of days ago about the Dallas Conference. The website has been updated and if you ll notice, the dates have
messages.messageBody:
Here is a copy of an email Barb sent me a couple of days ago about
the Dallas Conference. The website has been updated and if you'll
notice, the dates have changed from Labor Day weekend, to the weekend
following Labor Day.


Rethinking Education Conference NEWS
DETAILS, DETAILS The 12th annual conference is SEPTEMBER 4-8, 2008 -
Today is February 25, 2008



In This Issue

* Announcing our 2008 Speakers
* Until Next Time

Sign Up for Conference Updates



Click HERE for :

CONFERENCE info
REGISTER for RE 2008
VOLUNTEER info
WESTIN HOTEL info
RESERVE Westin Room
ABOUT Rethinking Education
WHAT is Unschooling?


It's Time to Register!

It's time to REGISTER for the 12th annual conference on Rethinking
Education. Our Early Registration deadline is April 30 - rates go up
on May 1!

Click the links on the left for all REGISTRATION details, HOTEL
details, PROGRAM details & VOLUNTEERING - even info on "What is
Unschooling?" & "About Rethinking Education!"


* Announcing our 2008 Speakers


Here are the highlights (so far!) of the Adult portion of our 2008
conference. We can't wait for your feedback. We're busy working
behind the scenes as this is being written to make this year the most
exhilarating, life-changing, inspiring event for whole families that
we have ever had!







JOSEPH CHILTON PEARCE, author of "Magical Child", "Evolution's
End", "Crack in the Cosmic Egg" & many more.
BERNIE DEKOVEN, a.k.a. MajorMajor Fun & author of "The Well Played
Game"
VALERIE FITZENREITER, unschool Mom & author of "The Unprocessed
Child: Living Without School"
KRENIE STOWE, M.D., unschool Mom, author of "A Doctor's Story: A
Personal Journey & A Call for Reform"
JODY MCLAUGHLIN, radical mother & publisher of "The Compleat Mother"
Magazine
RACHEL GATHERCOLE, unschool Mom & author of "The Well-Adjusted Child:
The Social Benefits of Homeschooling"
DAYNA & JOE MARTIN, radical unschool parents
SUNDAY COTE', unschool Mom & metaphysician
TRACY LIEBMANN, unschool Mom & consensual living devotee'
MARIA WHITWORTH, unschool Mom & author of "Say YES to Your Kids"
BOB COLLIER, Australian unschool Dad & founder of the "Parental
Intelligence Newsletter"
S. COURTNEY WALTON, unschool Mom & founder of the African American
Website & publisher of "FUNgasa: Free Oneself! The Magazine for
African American Home-Educators."
SEAN RITCHEY, co-founder of Quo Vadis, a community for unschooled
teens & adults
EVAN HUNTER WRIGHT, co-founder of Quo Vadis



* Until Next Time


We have so much to tell you about. Next week we begin our exciting
profile of speakers & sessions. In the meantime, complete information
is available on our conference website.


We appreciate your help in telling your friends about our 2008
conference! Please forward this update to them. They can sign up to
receive it directly by clicking on the black box at the top of this
update.... thanks!


Our first registration deadline is April 30. Save $ by registering
early! Early registration cost per person is $100 per person, which
includes all activities, sessions and Inspired Immersions for all 5
days... PLUS a buffet dinner on Sunday night, unlimited racquet ball
& basketball... and an entire hotel filled with fabulous unschooling
kids, teens, young adults, parents & grandparents!



JOIN US - it's all about YOU!

Call or email Barb with your proposals for a session or activity, and
be sure to check out our HUGE list of volunteer needs this year -
VOLUNTEERING saves you big bucks off registration and helps us alot.

We look forward to sharing space with you at the 12th national
conference on Rethinking Education in September! Stay tuned to our
regular email updates... and contact Barb anytime, about anything!

Life is an adventure, life is good! Take charge & create your wildest
dreams.


Love to everyone,


Barb Lundgren
Rethinking Education


email: barb@...
phone: 817.540.6423
web: http://www.THEunschoolingconference.com



Forward email



This email was sent to andwhitney@..., by
barb@...

| Privacy Policy. Email Marketing by


Barb Lundgren | 3013 Hickory Hill Lane | Colleyville | TX | 76034

messages.subject: The 2008 Unschooling Conference - Madison, WI
messages.msgSnippet: Please post to your group, if appropriate. Pass along to others who may be interested: Greetings from the 2008 Unschooling Conference in Madison, Wisconsin.
messages.messageBody:
Please post to your group, if appropriate. Pass along to others who may be interested:

Greetings from the 2008 Unschooling Conference in Madison, Wisconsin.

Our 2007 conference, the first unschooling conference ever in Wisconsin, was a huge success! It was a very energizing and renewing experience. Participants took full advantage of the small size of the conference and the intimate atmosphere to connect and have in-depth conversations with other conference attendees and presenters. Feedback was very enthusiastic, and many people asked for another conference in 2008, so here we go.

The 2008 Unschooling Conference, January 12, will feature a keynote address by Manish Jain of Shikshantar: The PeoplesÃ¢Â€Â™ Institute for Rethinking Development and Education, in Udaipur, India. We are looking forward to another exciting and fulfilling day of connecting with unschoolers, and expanding our unschooling horizons.

For more information and to download a registration form, please visit our website: www.unschoolingconference.com. We look forward to seeing everyone in January!

Tanya Cunningham
The Unschooling Conference
www.unschoolingconference.com
